headline.print_headline: Heart Group: E-Cigarettes Might Help Smokers Quit
headline.main: Heart Group: E-Cigarettes Might Help Smokers Quit

docs.lead_paragraph: The American Heart Association's first policy statement on electronic cigarettes backs them as a last resort to help smokers quit. The American Cancer Society has no formal policy but quietly took a similar stance in May.
docs.snippet: The American Heart Association's first policy statement on electronic cigarettes backs them as a last resort to help smokers quit. The American Cancer Society has no formal policy but quietly took a similar stance in May.
